title: My Personal Top 10 Goals For The 2022 World Cup. Ranking goals objectively is nigh impossible, these are just the ones I liked the most.

author: juansemoncayo
text: You're all about long shots. I think some serious team goals including the one with Messi dribbling Gvardiol before passing. Just magic.

author: gonzaloetjo
text:
Many fans have hardly played football in their lives and are hardly conscious about how difficult fast combinations of players passing, or team build-ups are.

Flashy thing done by one person is easy to digest, but this would be like NBA fans valuing 3-shoots over team buildups, which ain't the case as usually they are educated.

author: Misteuh
text: He really turned him inside out on that one. I feel like that would fall under best assists and not best goals. But that's just how I think about it.

author: gonzaloetjo
text: I always get the impression that people that don't value team efforts in goals haven't played much football themselves.

author: Misteuh
text: Valuing is one thing, but in terms of general rating a goal of individual brilliance would always top a team effort. A team goal I remember being in a top 10 was that Nacer Chadli goal vs Japan..that was a picture perfect counter attack.

author: gonzaloetjo
text:
Well, it’s what I said. General rating usually includes lots of people that haven’t played.

I personally value team goals miles ahead a kick from outside the goal area.
